name: MIS Multiple Prisoner Account Statement with Date Range Prompt
description: v1.0 This report is for multiple prisoners in an establishment and presents the data in Wing order.  It shows a list of all the prisoners' balances and transactions for a date range entered at run time.

dataset.name: Spends Balance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent) */)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102 AND AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Offender Account History\Account Caseload ID',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_1_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, 'TBD' AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_HEADER, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_FOOTER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Cash Balance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent) */)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2101 AND AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Offender Account History\Account Caseload ID',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, UNIT_1_CODE, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, 'TBD' AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_HEADER, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_FOOTER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Savings Balance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CURRENT_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.TRUST_ACCOUNTS_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent) */)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2103 AND AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Offender Account History\Account Caseload ID',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, UNIT_1_CODE, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, 'TBD' AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_HEADER, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_FOOTER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Spend Txns
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN ((SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:101) */)) AND ((SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter End Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:102) */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */)) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102 AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */)) AND AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Offender Account Transactions\Transaction Caseload ID',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, UNIT_1_CODE, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, 'TBD' AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_HEADER, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_FOOTER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Cash Txns
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN ((SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:101) */)) AND ((SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter End Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:102) */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */)) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2101 AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */)) AND AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Offender Account Transactions\Transaction Caseload ID',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_1_CODE, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, 'TBD' AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_HEADER, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_FOOTER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Save Txns
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN ((SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:101) */)) AND ((SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter End Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:102) */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Numbers (All for all)',,,multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:52) */)) AND AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2103 AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */)) AND AT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Offender Account Transactions\Transaction Caseload ID',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_1_CODE, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, 'TBD' AS V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_HEADER, 'TBD' AS V_CASH_FOOTER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34
field.legacySql: =[Cash Balance].[Sum of Account Opening-Balance] + RunningSum([Cash Txns].[Credit Amount]-[Cash Txns].[Debit Amount];FORCE_COL;([NOMS Number])) + 0

field.name: $ref:V_CASH_HEADER
field.legacySql: ="Opening Private Cash Balance as at "+ToDate(Left(UserResponse([Cash Txns];"Enter Start Date");10);"dd/MM/yyyy")

field.name: $ref:V_CASH_FOOTER
field.legacySql: ="Closing Private Cash Balance as at " + Left(UserResponse([Cash Txns];"Enter End Date");10)

field.name: $ref:V_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION_B34
field.legacySql: =[Cash Balance].[Sum of Account Opening-Balance] + RunningSum([Cash Txns].[Credit Amount]-[Cash Txns].[Debit Amount];FORCE_COL;([NOMS Number])) + 0
